title: Andhimantharai Lyrics Muran Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer(s) : Suchitra, Mega, Daya, Naveen Madhav
Song: Andhimantharai
Movie: Muran
Music Director : Sajan Madhav

Andhimantharai poo poo pookum neram
Ada innum enna thooram
Kollum manadhu koo koo koochal podum
ellaikalai meerum

Andhimantharai poo poo pookum neram
Innum innum enna thooram
Kollum manadhu koo koo koochal podum
ellai ellaikalai meerum

Ingum angum palakkangal meyum
Thaniye thoorathil nilavum kaayum
Etti nikkaadhe vendum vegam
Aasai theeraamal iravo alaindhu thaeyum thaeyum,
unmel paayum

Iraviltaan vaanavil naan -nee
thottal podhum sindhum enthan vannam
Pagal ingae thevayilai,
neelattum indha pozhu innum innum

Ila nenjil aasai oonjal
Idai velai indri aadum yogam konjam
Idi minnal puyalai pole
oru Nodiyil maarum nenjam

Iruttukendrum koochamillai naam sollvadhu
Acham vittu micham thottal uchcham nee selvadhu
(Andhimantharai ....)

Megam megamum urasikollum karrupu iravile
Dhegamum dhegamum urasi kondaal nerupu manadhile

Vattathukulle vaazhum vazhkai inbam illaye...
Kottai thaandum podhe sparisam eerkum unnaiye

Kanjathanam un idayilum udaiyilum naan kaanpadhu
Panjam mattum illai en azhagendru
Theenda theenda thilaikirathe...

Andhimantharai poo poo pookum neram
Ada innum enna thooram
Kollum manadhu koo koo koochal podum
ellaikalai meerum

Ingum angum palakkangal meyum
Thaniye thoorathil nilavum kaayum
Etti nikkaadhe vendum vegam
Aasai theeraamal iravo alaindhu thaeyum thaeyum,
unmel paayum

Andhimantharai ...
